meanings.definition: To create or spread myths about something.
meanings.sent1: The storyteller mythologizes ancient heroes to entertain children.
meanings.sent2: She mythologizes the history of the town to make it more interesting.
meanings.sent3: Grandpa always mythologizes his fishing adventures to make us laugh.
meanings.sent4: The artist mythologizes the ordinary into extraordinary through his paintings.
meanings.sent5: The author mythologizes the world of magic, making it come alive for readers.

meanings.definition: To portray or interpret something in a mythical or exaggerated way.
meanings.sent1: The movie mythologizes the life of the famous singer, adding drama for effect.
meanings.sent2: He mythologizes his achievements, making them seem larger than life.
meanings.sent3: The comedian mythologizes his daily mishaps on stage, making them hilarious tales.
meanings.sent4: Her artwork mythologizes nature, turning it into a mystical realm.
meanings.sent5: The poet mythologizes love, capturing its essence in beautiful verses.
